page.title: 12My Day.
page.content: My mum usually wakes me at 7-30 a.m. I dress and for breakfast I have fruit n'fibre.After breakfast I wash,brush my hair and teeth.I catch the school bus at 7-57.The bus arrives at school at 8-50 and school starts at 9-00.We do some maths,handwriting,listening,art and English.For lunch to-day I had cheese flan,chips and beans followed by apple sponge with custard.A lot of children bring packed lunch.In the dinner hour the girls skip,a game called under and over.The older boys play football.After lunch our class is joined by a younger class for assembly. After silent reading I cooked with my group.We made treacle tart. After cooking we had science then we put up our chairs,said prayers and returned home.At home I watched television then I had dinner.I changed and went to judo lessons.
